data.sentence: The word النُّجُومُ comes from the root ن ج م and is associated with the meanings: to appear/rise/begin, accomplish, ensue, proceed.

data.meanings: To be muddy, be obscure, lose light, fall.
data.sentence: The word انْكَدَرَتْ comes from the root ك د ر and is associated with the meanings: To be muddy, be obscure, lose light, fall.
